name: string-reverse-upper-wasm
description: Simple codebase for reversing a string and upper-casing it via WebAssembly with jco

scripts.build: jco componentize string-reverse-upper.js --wit wit/ --world-name revup --out string-reverse-upper.incomplete.wasm --disable all
scripts.compose: npm run build:dep && wac plug --plug ../string-reverse/string-reverse.wasm string-reverse-upper.incomplete.wasm -o string-reverse-upper.wasm
scripts.all: npm run build:dep ; npm run build ; npm run compose ; npm run transpile ; npm run transpiled-js
